title: The Curious Prayer Life Of Muriel Smith
description: One unlocked car door, one glance to the left, and suddenly impoverished retiree Muriel Smith is hurtling down the road at an alarming thirty miles per hour!Will the teenage carjacker really shoot to kill? Muriel can't die yet. Not until she's accomplished something to make her daughter proud. Not until she's seen her great-grandchild, the unborn baby her granddaughter isn't sure she wants to keep.It seems Muriel is running out of time. Especially if her survival depends on her driving skills!Muriel and her carjacker find themselves on a wild adventure that has them both falling "victim" to Muriel's curious prayer life.
author: Carol Raj
